content.raw:
I'll look into that. 

Actually I have a doubt about the selection which can make things simpler here. Right now, if there's nothing selected and you click on a part, the whole model is selected. With the model selected, clicking again on a part will select only that part. I wonder if selecting the whole model is worth the extra trouble here. I saw on the comments on pull request #1079 that this can be confusing for users. I think that selecting the whole model is only useful if the user wants to manipulate everything at once, but they can always do this when exiting model edit mode...
